content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a legal case without mentioning the names of the parties involved the case involves a participant who is owed 11834 euros the text explains that the case took place over a period of 360 days from april 15 2014 to july 21 2014 the specific details and parties involved are not provided the case involves a dispute over the allocation of business premises owned by a specific estate the dispute resolution process began on july 21 2014 with a meeting between the mediator and the parties involved the application for division of assets was filed on april 15 2014 and both parties were present with their respective attorneys the parties agreed to attempt conciliation and a preliminary contract for the purchase and sale of the assets was filed a new meeting was scheduled but later postponed on july 18 2014 one of the lawyers transmitted a waiver of mandate during the session the parties reached an agreement on the division of the assets the agreement stated that certain properties would be attributed to each party and the brothers involved would pay a certain amount to mr p f the parties declared their satisfaction with the division and agreed to formalize the agreements with a notary public at a later stage the costs of the mediation process were mentioned totaling 111834 euros the designated mediator certified the conciliation and declared the proceedings closed
